title: Math Methods in Engr
description: The Laplace transform and applications, Fourier series, boundary value problems for partial differential equations.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
